IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO FOSTER AND PROMOTE THE GROWTH, PROGRESS AND GENERAL WELFARE OF THE ESU OF PENNSYLVANIA.
IRS990.MissionDesc: ESU FOUNDATION IS DEDICATED TO SECURING AND STEWARDING PRIVATE GIFTS AND GRANTS THAT BENEFIT EAST STROUDSBURG UNIVERSITY AND THEN DISTRIBUTING THESE GIFTS IN THE FORM OF SCHOLARSHIPS, GRANTS AND ASSISTANCE TO THE STUDENTS AND FACULTY OF ESU.
IRS990.Desc: ALL UNRESTRICTED FUNDS COLLECTED BY THE FOUNDATION ARE USED TO PROVIDE GIFTS AND GRANTS TO EAST STROUDSBURG UNIVERSITY, ITS FACULTY AND STUDENTS AND TO PAY THE FOUNDATION'S OPERATIONAL COSTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: DONATIONS AND CONTRIBUTIONS WERE MADE TO VARIOUS ORGANIZATIONS WITHIN THE UNIVERSITY. THE MONIES ARE TO BE USED FOR EDUCATIONAL ADVANCEMENT PURPOSES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: SCHOLARSHIPS TO THE STUDENTS OF EAST STROUDSBURG UNIVERSITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION'S PERMANENTLY RESTRICTED ENDOWMENT CONSISTS OF VARIOUS FUNDS INTENDED BY THE RESPECTIVE DONORS TO BE HELD IN PERPETUITY IN SUPPORT OF SCHOLARSHIPS OR OTHER ACTIVITIES OF THE FOUNDATION OR UNIVERSITY. THE TEMPORARILY RESTRICTED BALANCE RELATED TO THESE FUNDS REPRESENT THE NET OF ACCUMULATED EARNINGS ON THE FUNDS PROVIDED OFFSET BY EXPENDITURES WHICH MEET THE DONORS REQUIREMENTS. AS REQUIRED BY GENERALLY ACCEPTED ACCOUNTING PRINCIPLES, NET ASSETS ASSOCIATED WITH THE ENDOWMENTS ARE CLASSIFIED AND REPORTED BASED ON THE EXISTENCE OR ABSENCE OF DONOR-IMPOSED RESTRICTIONS.

NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES HAS BEEN MADE IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS SINCE THE FOUNDATION IS EXEMPT FROM FEDERAL AND STATE INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE AND SIMILAR STATE PROVISIONS. HOWEVER,INCOME FROM ACTIVITIES NOT DIRECTLY RELATED TO THE FOUNDATION'S TAX-EXEMPT PURPOSE, IF ANY, WOULD BE SUBJECT TO TAXATION AS UNRELATED BUSINESS INCOME. THE FOUNDATION COMPLIES WITH THE GUIDANCE FOR UNCERTAINTY IN INCOME TAXES USING THE PROVISIONS OF FASB ASC 740, INCOME TAXES. USING THAT GUIDANCE TAX POSITIONS INITIALLY NEED TO BE RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS WHEN IT IS MORE-LIKELY-THAN-NOT THE POSITION WILL BE SUSTAINED UPON EXAMINATION BY TAX AUTHORITIES.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF SPLIT INTEREST AGREEMENT -23,669.

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: DONATIONS AND CONTRIBUTIONS WERE MADE TO VARIOUS ORGANIZATIONS WITHIN THE UNIVERSITY. THE MONIES ARE TO BE USED FOR EDUCATIONAL ADVANCEMENT PURPOSES.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: SCHOLARSHIPS FOR STUDENTS OF EAST STROUDSBURG UNIVERSITY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 WILL BE REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR AND CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER. THE FORM WILL THEN BE DISTRIBUTED TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS BEFORE FILING FOR FINAL REVIEW/COMMENT.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS REVIEWED BY THE BOARD AND SIGNED BY NEW BOARD MEMBERS EVERY AUGUST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION DETERMINES OFFICER COMPENSATION THROUGH COMPARABILITY DATA, SUBSTANTIATION AND DELIBERATION AND A REVIEW OF THE COMPENSATION BY INDEPENDENT PERSONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 18
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES THESE DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THOSE WHO COME INTO THEIR OFFICE DURING NORMAL BUSINESS HOURS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION MAKES THESE DOCUMENTS AVAILABLE TO THOSE WHO COME INTO THEIR OFFICE DURING NORMAL BUSINESS HOURS.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF SPLIT INTEREST AGREEMENTS -23,669.
THE ORGANIZATION HAS AN FINANCE COMMITTEE THAT ASSUMES RESPONSIBILITY OF THE AUDIT AND SELECTION OF THE INDEPENDENT AUDITOR.
